label: Gloom
description: Featuring an ominous piano in reverse, this track aims to innovate within my personal musical style and was composed early in the album's development. Combining electronic ambiance with a massive finish was on my bucket list, and is now crossed out!
why: This track represented everything I had learned up to its creation. It's compositionally interesting, achieves a clean, wide mix, and features unique sounds that I personally designed. I'm extremely proud of the end result!
